description:
Born on January 1st, 2001; granddaughter of http://anidb.net/ch25760 [Stefan L. Maverick], one of the leaders of the "http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Project Gaia]". Squad leader of http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] field work operations, third in command in the AMP hierarchy, pilot of the Simurgh aircraft.
She is a http://anidb.net/ch25999 [visioneer], able to dive into computer networks and use all her senses there; she has "external body parts" including her "assistants" Huey (intelligent motorcycle), Dewey (vaguely humanoid robot) and Louie (AMP central computer) plus Donald (a military satellite in earth orbit holding her "external memory").
name: Lebia Maverick
